title: Menu
markdownDescription:
https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-menu

VTEX Menu is a store component responsible for displaying a bar containing links and drop-down sub-menus.

To build the store's menu options, you need to configure the `menu-item` blocks. These can be declared in two different ways in `vtex.menu@2.x:menu`: as `children` or as `props`. The advantage of this latest menu-item configuration compared is that Site Editor can be used to edit the blocks.

`"vtex.menu@2.x"`

title.markdownDescription: Define a custom name. It will be shown in site editor for faster identification.

children.markdownDescription: Declare the blocks that must be wrapped inside the current one.

props.markdownDescription: All available properties for this block.
